price: 147. Nabiyow Qhiblat kee diini caagidik kol obtem ku-Rabbik yan cakki kinnik wohut Agay-waagita marih num makkin kaak iyye Yalli.
arabic: ٱلۡحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّكَ فَلَا تَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلۡمُمۡتَرِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: al-ḥaqu min rabbika falā takūnanna mina al-mum'tarīna
